app.title: AI Attractiveness Test
app.description: Upload a photo to analyze your facial beauty score

upload.title: Select Photo
upload.dragAndDrop: Click to upload or drag and drop
upload.fileTypes: Accepts JPG, PNG, WebP. Max size 3MB.
upload.requirements: Clear, front-facing, no obstructions (sunglasses/masks), no filters, color photo, recommended for users 16+.

result.examples: Example faces in different score ranges:

issues.filter_detected: Filter detected, result may be inaccurate.
issues.pose_off_center: Face not centered, result may be inaccurate.
issues.low_resolution: Low resolution image, result may be inaccurate.
issues.poor_lighting: Poor lighting conditions, result may be inaccurate.
issues.multiple_faces: Multiple faces detected, result for dominant face.
issues.face_partially_visible: Face partially visible, result may be inaccurate.
issues.default: Issue detected, result may be inaccurate.

errors.title: Error
errors.NO_FACE_DETECTED: No face detected. Please upload a clear, front-facing photo.
errors.PROCESSING_TIMEOUT: Analysis timed out. Please check your connection, try compressing the image, or try again later.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Analysis failed. Please try again later.
